name: Royal Greatsword
r1: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 28% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
r2: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 36% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
r3: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 44% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
r4: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 52% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
r5: On hit, Charged Attacks increase Base ATK and Base DEF by 60% for 10s. Can only occur once every 20s.
